document_data.mainbody: '''Emperor of the Lotus Throne''', also called the '''Lotus Emperor''', was the traditional head of the [[Lotus Court]] and ruler of the [[Yikarian Empire]].{{Cite dragon/241/Campaign Classics: The Roof of the World}}
document_data.Activities: The Emperor not only ruled the vast Empire, but also served as the High Priest of the [[Faceless God]]â€”the only deity worshiped by the [[yak-folk]]. The Emperor himself was even sacrificed to his god after 20 years of serving as the Emperor. Traditionally, a younger yak-man was chosen by the Faceless God for this position.
